And think: she wanted storms.

tags: i say as of now unfinished clone wars episodes because it is very likely that they'll finish animating the crisis on utapau arc as well as
the bad batch arc for the new season
but we obviously don't know yet whether they'll do that or not
summary: Utapau is a kyber crystal source???
question: Utapau is a kyber crystal source???
answer: Ohh yes, it is!  If I remember correctly, that was one of the major plot points of the Crisis on Utapau arc from the (as of now) unfinished Clone Wars episodes.  I believe Palpatine was interested in using a large kyber crystal as the powering source for his Death Star or something like that.  Though I have to wonder if the Jedi ever considered getting their kyber crystals from there or if it has to be from Ilum.

reblog.comment: Ohh yes, it is!  If I remember correctly, that was one of the major plot points of the Crisis on Utapau arc from the (as of now) unfinished Clone Wars episodes.  I believe Palpatine was interested in using a large kyber crystal as the powering source for his Death Star or something like that.  Though I have to wonder if the Jedi ever considered getting their kyber crystals from there or if it has to be from Ilum.

summary: If the use of clones and droids and the Jedi in the Clone Wars make the whole thing seem separate from the common people in the...
question: If the use of clones and droids and the Jedi in the Clone Wars make the whole thing seem separate from the common people in the Republic, then how does it have such a major affect on people's perception of the Jedi?
answer: Han didn’t believe in the Force or the power of the Jedi. They fought out in the open across the galaxy for 3+ years and he didn’t believe they were real. That’s your answer.

reblog.comment: Han didn’t believe in the Force or the power of the Jedi. They fought out in the open across the galaxy for 3+ years and he didn’t believe they were real. That’s your answer.

blog.name: shitty-aus-nobody-asked-for
blog.title: Alternate Universe
blog.description:
No, screamed Luke when he saw who Darth Vader was. The founder of Hello Kitty. His favourite brand.
Nobody ever said my AUs make sense. Some of them are evil. Some of them are too pure. Some of them may be weird. Some of them might be crossovers.
And I want all of them to be written. Feel free to use them as prompts but please send me a link afterwards.

tags: i can't get over the idea of darth vader on the battlefield with a f*cking breadstick in his hands
summary:
Star Wars and everything is the same except for the jedi fighting with baguettes instead of light sabers.
And don't you dare to...
body:
Star Wars and everything is the same except for the jedi fighting with baguettes instead of light sabers.

And don’t you dare to think they can’t kill you with baguettes.

summary: Obi-Wan Kenobi x Reader - Tainted Love
title: Obi-Wan Kenobi x Reader - Tainted Love
body:
A/N: Finally a Star Wars requested *heart eyes* Since I wrote this one I am in such a big Star Wars especially for Obi Wan and Kylo Ren. So, if any of you have requests about these two…come to me ;)

Thanks anon to bring back my Star Wars motivation XD
And thanks to @huxy-baby of course :)

Requests are open

Fandomlist
Masterlist of 2017
Masterlist of January 2018
Masterlist of Feburary 2018
Masterlist of March 2018
Masterlist of April 2018
Masterlist of May 2018

GIF IS NOT MINE

Word Count: 1.102

________________________________________________________________

Tainted Love.

A love you have for a person that is so deep and feels like it should last forever, but it can’t for some complicated, unfair reason.

This is how Obi-Wan would describe his feelings he felt for his fellow Jedi. Master (Y/N) (Y/L/N) was there with him ever since they started their training to become Jedi.

As young Padawans they both started under their Masters. Sharing the same fate, it was clear that these two would start to become friends. Both Qui-Gon Jin and (Y/N)’s Master Meelto a Twi’lek had sensed that the bond (Y/N) and Obi-Wan shared was special.

As often as possible you trained together, went on missions and took breaks together.

“Don’t you think this is going a bit too far my old friend?” Meelto once said to Qui-Gon as they both watched their Padawan’s train together.

Qui-Gon shook his head at his alien friend.

“You fear too much, Master Meelto. I think that Obi Wan needs (Y/N)’s company and vice versa. I just have the best in mind for my Padawan.” Meelto nodded, understanding fully what the other Jedi Master said.

But still he had this bad feeling in his gut when he watched (Y/N)’s eyes closely as they followed Obi-Wan’s every move.

-

“Obi Wan?” (Y/N) knocked on his door but no answer came. The young woman could hear some muffled cries, but the door was closed.

With a sigh, she turned her back to the door only to be greeted by the young Anakin Skywalker, a little boy Obi-Wan and his Master had found on Tatooine.

“Hello little Padawan,” she greeted him with a smile on her face. The boy blinked at her for a moment without any expression.

“Don’t worry Master (Y/L/N), Master Kenobi will be fine,” the young boy tried reassure her and she ruffled his hair slightly.

“Thank you for your words, Anakin.” (Y/N) left the boy near the doors, but her worry for her friend grew as she distanced herself from his chambers.

Obi-Wan now had the task to train the young Skywalker to be a Jedi. Hopefully, it distracted him from the loss of his Master.

Or so she had hoped to the Force.

-

“Anakin, calm down. I can sense you uneasiness,” Obi-Wan scolded the his Padawan, but the young man couldn’t hide his excitement of seeing Padme once again after such a long time.

With a little smirk he turned to his Master.

“Is it my uneasiness, Master? Or is it yours of seeing Master (Y/L/N)?” Anakin laughed a bit as he saw the shocked expression of his Master.

He was ready to scold him, telling him once more about the Jedi Code and forbidden affections, when the elevator doors chimed open.

In front it waited (Y/N) patiently for the both to step out.

Her (Y/H/C) hair was bound into a compact braided bun, still some strands fell down from it, her brown robes hugged her form and flew down to the ground as she started to grin.

“Obi-Wan,” she cheered and hugged her old friend tightly. Taken aback by her actions, Obi-Wan carefully laid his arms around her and patted her back, making Anakin snicker behind him.

She let go of her friend and turned to his Padawan, needing to look up at him. A teasing smile crossed her lips.

“Well, someone ate their vegetables,” Anakin rolled his eyes at her comment but he smiled.

“Hello, Master (Y/L/N),” he also got a warm hug from the woman, making Obi-Wan a bit jealous, but quickly he got rid of this emotion. It didn’t suit a Jedi like him.

“Follow me. I am sure Padme is glad to see you, too,” and with that, she led the way to the Senator.

-

It was night time and everything was quiet. Everything expect for Obi-Wan’s mind, which was racing around many topics, but no matter what he did, his thoughts wandered back to (Y/N).

Not seeing the point in laying in bed, drowning in his own thoughts, he got up and left his room.

He felt conflicted ever since he met (Y/N) again. She grew even more beautiful than he had feared it to be.

Her (Y/E/C) haunted his dreams, her laugh made his heart skip a beat. Feelings he had sworn to never develop boiled in the depths of his heart.

It was against the Jedi Code, against everything he stood for and believed in. Still, he didn’t want to lose this feeling he had when he was so near her.

“Obi-Wan?” her voice sounded in his ears and he quickly turned around to see (Y/N) standing in the dark halls, her night robes tightly around her body.

“What are doing  this late at night?” she asked with a tilted head and worry in her eyes.

“I…couldn’t sleep,” he answered truthfully to her and she nodded.

“What are you doing at these late hours?” he asked after an uncomfortable silence.

They both started to walk around the halls, as (Y/N) explained her grief about the death of her Master. A mission gone horribly wrong, she blamed herself for it.

The man stopped in his tracks, making the woman turn to him. Obi-Wan pulled at her shoulders, pulling her close to him so he could see her eyes clearly.

“Nothing was your fault,” he whispered. “You did everything you were capable of. Master Meelto, for sure, was proud of you,” a silent tear escaped her eye, but he caught it with his thumb as he grazed her cheek lightly.

For a moment, he was conflicted with himself. One half wanted to kiss her so badly, but the other scolded himself for these unappreciated thoughts. The Code stood between him and his feelings he had for (Y/N).

While his mind tried to get a solution to his dilemma, his body reacted faster.

He leant into (Y/N), their lips barely met, but neither of them flinched away.

As he realized what he did, it was too late. Their lips met in a shy kiss.

Quickly, Obi-Wan pulled away, scared of what he had done, of the reaction she might have.

“We can’t…” he whispered lowly. “The Code…” but she pressed a finger to his lips to silence him.

“Forget this Code just for tonight…” she pleaded him and it seemed that this was it, what he needed to hear from her to kiss her once again.

This time the kiss was more confident, full of passion and love.

Tonight, they weren’t Jedi anymore. Tonight, they were two people who enjoyed the love of the other and no Code shall stop them.

Thanks anon to bring back my Star Wars motivation XD
And thanks to @huxy-baby of course :)

Qui-Gon shook his head at his alien friend.

“You fear too much, Master Meelto. I think that Obi Wan needs (Y/N)’s company and vice versa. I just have the best in mind for my Padawan.” Meelto nodded, understanding fully what the other Jedi Master said.

“Anakin, calm down. I can sense you uneasiness,” Obi-Wan scolded the his Padawan, but the young man couldn’t hide his excitement of seeing Padme once again after such a long time.

With a little smirk he turned to his Master.

“Is it my uneasiness, Master? Or is it yours of seeing Master (Y/L/N)?” Anakin laughed a bit as he saw the shocked expression of his Master.

He was ready to scold him, telling him once more about the Jedi Code and forbidden affections, when the elevator doors chimed open.

In front it waited (Y/N) patiently for the both to step out.

Her (Y/H/C) hair was bound into a compact braided bun, still some strands fell down from it, her brown robes hugged her form and flew down to the ground as she started to grin.

“Obi-Wan,” she cheered and hugged her old friend tightly. Taken aback by her actions, Obi-Wan carefully laid his arms around her and patted her back, making Anakin snicker behind him.

She let go of her friend and turned to his Padawan, needing to look up at him. A teasing smile crossed her lips.

“Well, someone ate their vegetables,” Anakin rolled his eyes at her comment but he smiled.

“Hello, Master (Y/L/N),” he also got a warm hug from the woman, making Obi-Wan a bit jealous, but quickly he got rid of this emotion. It didn’t suit a Jedi like him.

“Follow me. I am sure Padme is glad to see you, too,” and with that, she led the way to the Senator.

-

It was night time and everything was quiet. Everything expect for Obi-Wan’s mind, which was racing around many topics, but no matter what he did, his thoughts wandered back to (Y/N).

Not seeing the point in laying in bed, drowning in his own thoughts, he got up and left his room.

He felt conflicted ever since he met (Y/N) again. She grew even more beautiful than he had feared it to be.

Her (Y/E/C) haunted his dreams, her laugh made his heart skip a beat. Feelings he had sworn to never develop boiled in the depths of his heart.

It was against the Jedi Code, against everything he stood for and believed in. Still, he didn’t want to lose this feeling he had when he was so near her.

“Obi-Wan?” her voice sounded in his ears and he quickly turned around to see (Y/N) standing in the dark halls, her night robes tightly around her body.

“What are doing  this late at night?” she asked with a tilted head and worry in her eyes.

“I…couldn’t sleep,” he answered truthfully to her and she nodded.

“What are you doing at these late hours?” he asked after an uncomfortable silence.

They both started to walk around the halls, as (Y/N) explained her grief about the death of her Master. A mission gone horribly wrong, she blamed herself for it.

The man stopped in his tracks, making the woman turn to him. Obi-Wan pulled at her shoulders, pulling her close to him so he could see her eyes clearly.

“Nothing was your fault,” he whispered. “You did everything you were capable of. Master Meelto, for sure, was proud of you,” a silent tear escaped her eye, but he caught it with his thumb as he grazed her cheek lightly.

For a moment, he was conflicted with himself. One half wanted to kiss her so badly, but the other scolded himself for these unappreciated thoughts. The Code stood between him and his feelings he had for (Y/N).

While his mind tried to get a solution to his dilemma, his body reacted faster.

He leant into (Y/N), their lips barely met, but neither of them flinched away.

As he realized what he did, it was too late. Their lips met in a shy kiss.

Quickly, Obi-Wan pulled away, scared of what he had done, of the reaction she might have.

“We can’t…” he whispered lowly. “The Code…” but she pressed a finger to his lips to silence him.

“Forget this Code just for tonight…” she pleaded him and it seemed that this was it, what he needed to hear from her to kiss her once again.

This time the kiss was more confident, full of passion and love.

Tonight, they weren’t Jedi anymore. Tonight, they were two people who enjoyed the love of the other and no Code shall stop them.
trail.content:
A/N: Finally a Star Wars requested *heart eyes* Since I wrote this one I am in such a big Star Wars especially for Obi Wan and Kylo Ren. So, if any of you have requests about these two…come to me ;)

Thanks anon to bring back my Star Wars motivation XD
And thanks to @huxy-baby of course :)

Requests are open

Fandomlist
Masterlist of 2017
Masterlist of January 2018
Masterlist of Feburary 2018
Masterlist of March 2018
Masterlist of April 2018
Masterlist of May 2018

GIF IS NOT MINE

Word Count: 1.102

________________________________________________________________

Tainted Love.

A love you have for a person that is so deep and feels like it should last forever, but it can’t for some complicated, unfair reason.

This is how Obi-Wan would describe his feelings he felt for his fellow Jedi. Master (Y/N) (Y/L/N) was there with him ever since they started their training to become Jedi.

As young Padawans they both started under their Masters. Sharing the same fate, it was clear that these two would start to become friends. Both Qui-Gon Jin and (Y/N)’s Master Meelto a Twi’lek had sensed that the bond (Y/N) and Obi-Wan shared was special.

As often as possible you trained together, went on missions and took breaks together.

“Don’t you think this is going a bit too far my old friend?” Meelto once said to Qui-Gon as they both watched their Padawan’s train together.

Qui-Gon shook his head at his alien friend.

“You fear too much, Master Meelto. I think that Obi Wan needs (Y/N)’s company and vice versa. I just have the best in mind for my Padawan.” Meelto nodded, understanding fully what the other Jedi Master said.

But still he had this bad feeling in his gut when he watched (Y/N)’s eyes closely as they followed Obi-Wan’s every move.

-

“Obi Wan?” (Y/N) knocked on his door but no answer came. The young woman could hear some muffled cries, but the door was closed.

With a sigh, she turned her back to the door only to be greeted by the young Anakin Skywalker, a little boy Obi-Wan and his Master had found on Tatooine.

“Hello little Padawan,” she greeted him with a smile on her face. The boy blinked at her for a moment without any expression.

“Don’t worry Master (Y/L/N), Master Kenobi will be fine,” the young boy tried reassure her and she ruffled his hair slightly.

“Thank you for your words, Anakin.” (Y/N) left the boy near the doors, but her worry for her friend grew as she distanced herself from his chambers.

Obi-Wan now had the task to train the young Skywalker to be a Jedi. Hopefully, it distracted him from the loss of his Master.

Or so she had hoped to the Force.

-

“Anakin, calm down. I can sense you uneasiness,” Obi-Wan scolded the his Padawan, but the young man couldn’t hide his excitement of seeing Padme once again after such a long time.

With a little smirk he turned to his Master.

He was ready to scold him, telling him once more about the Jedi Code and forbidden affections, when the elevator doors chimed open.

In front it waited (Y/N) patiently for the both to step out.

“Obi-Wan,” she cheered and hugged her old friend tightly. Taken aback by her actions, Obi-Wan carefully laid his arms around her and patted her back, making Anakin snicker behind him.

She let go of her friend and turned to his Padawan, needing to look up at him. A teasing smile crossed her lips.

“Well, someone ate their vegetables,” Anakin rolled his eyes at her comment but he smiled.

“Hello, Master (Y/L/N),” he also got a warm hug from the woman, making Obi-Wan a bit jealous, but quickly he got rid of this emotion. It didn’t suit a Jedi like him.

“Follow me. I am sure Padme is glad to see you, too,” and with that, she led the way to the Senator.

-

It was night time and everything was quiet. Everything expect for Obi-Wan’s mind, which was racing around many topics, but no matter what he did, his thoughts wandered back to (Y/N).

Not seeing the point in laying in bed, drowning in his own thoughts, he got up and left his room.

He felt conflicted ever since he met (Y/N) again. She grew even more beautiful than he had feared it to be.

Her (Y/E/C) haunted his dreams, her laugh made his heart skip a beat. Feelings he had sworn to never develop boiled in the depths of his heart.

It was against the Jedi Code, against everything he stood for and believed in. Still, he didn’t want to lose this feeling he had when he was so near her.

“Obi-Wan?” her voice sounded in his ears and he quickly turned around to see (Y/N) standing in the dark halls, her night robes tightly around her body.

“What are doing  this late at night?” she asked with a tilted head and worry in her eyes.

“I…couldn’t sleep,” he answered truthfully to her and she nodded.

“What are you doing at these late hours?” he asked after an uncomfortable silence.

They both started to walk around the halls, as (Y/N) explained her grief about the death of her Master. A mission gone horribly wrong, she blamed herself for it.

The man stopped in his tracks, making the woman turn to him. Obi-Wan pulled at her shoulders, pulling her close to him so he could see her eyes clearly.

“Nothing was your fault,” he whispered. “You did everything you were capable of. Master Meelto, for sure, was proud of you,” a silent tear escaped her eye, but he caught it with his thumb as he grazed her cheek lightly.

For a moment, he was conflicted with himself. One half wanted to kiss her so badly, but the other scolded himself for these unappreciated thoughts. The Code stood between him and his feelings he had for (Y/N).

While his mind tried to get a solution to his dilemma, his body reacted faster.

He leant into (Y/N), their lips barely met, but neither of them flinched away.

As he realized what he did, it was too late. Their lips met in a shy kiss.

Quickly, Obi-Wan pulled away, scared of what he had done, of the reaction she might have.

“We can’t…” he whispered lowly. “The Code…” but she pressed a finger to his lips to silence him.

“Forget this Code just for tonight…” she pleaded him and it seemed that this was it, what he needed to hear from her to kiss her once again.

This time the kiss was more confident, full of passion and love.

summary: I saw you reblog a piece of Tumblr history, but I thought you were a fairly new blog. How long have you been here, if I may ask?
question: I saw you reblog a piece of Tumblr history, but I thought you were a fairly new blog. How long have you been here, if I may ask?
answer:
Officially, I think I discovered this site in 2012, but it wasn’t until after watching TFA that I actually started casually browsing the site. It wasn’t that bad, as a casual browser lol. I reblogged that picture of tumblr history cause I love Mr. Anderson saying “I was there, Gandalf!” The closet I’ve been to fandoms before this, was fanfiction.net and TV Tropes.

I gotta say, this site isn’t as bad as all the meme sites make it out to be lol. I originally only made an account to be salty about GOT and post how House Martel and House Stark deserve better,, then I stopped using it…but then I saw TLJ and it’s like I became Crait! Full of hatred and salt! That’s when I started posting and decided to stay. So technically I’ve been aware of tumblr for years, but this account is fairly newish.

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina
